Name: Divine Reckoning
Story Background: In the midst of the battle between light and dark, the divine powers bring forth a reckoning that will decide the fate of all.
Ability: Destroy all non-angel creatures. Each player gains life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.
Appearance Description: The art depicts a blinding light descending from the heavens, engulfing the battlefield in a radiant glow. Angelic figures can be seen emerging from the light, their visages both serene and powerful.
